nodes.text: The Battle of Dandrian's Ring was the final battle of the Belderone Contention in the 900s BBY. Part of the campaigns to reunify the galaxy after the New Sith Wars, it was fought at Dandrian's Ring, an asteroid belt orbiting Dandrian in the Belderone sector. The battle was a victory for the Galactic Republic and the Republic's Judicial Forces distinguished themselves in the engagement.
